effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to begin a Winning Streak!, increasing the damage of Overpower by 5%, stacking up to 10 times. 
Overpower has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!
Set: When your Winning Streak! ends you gain 2% Haste and your Mortal Strike and Cleave damage is increased by 2% per stack of Winning Streak! you had for 12 sec.

Transmogrified to:
Eternal Gauntlets of Wrath

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description: Equip: Your abilities have a very high chance to lash out with a Hateful Strike, inflicting 340,707 Physical damage to an enemy and healing you for 13,176. These effects are increased by 100% while you are below 35% health.

Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 7,731 to 9,450 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 286 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Eternal Cloak of Wrath

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
